name: EGO Protocol
description: INNOVATIVE! ADDICTIVE! FASCINATING! LOGICAL! It is EGO PROTOCOL, an award-winning action-packed puzzle platformer that will addict you from the first play!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 or newer Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GT610 Storage: 1 GB available space
